column5: It's taken me far too long to get this video posted but here is part 1.  I decided to leave my 500mm lens back at camp one of the days and shoot video to give everyone the opportunity to see what the shooting conditions were like....enjoy and watch in HD!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJOoDKdv5Z8
Great vid with bears on either side of the shore, if some would have come down the path you came in on you would have been surrounded....were you ever afraid?
just curious what your safety net is-a firearm , bear mace, anything
I am speechless, thank you for sharing this fantastic experience.
